programme.title: The Hellbenders
programme.desc: After the civil war, a hell-bent Confederate Army Officer and his sons rob a Union Caravan carrying a fortune, killing every man and beast in the process. programme.title: Tenebre
programme.desc: A writer arrives in Rome only to find that somebody is using his novels as the inspiration and occasionally the means of committing murder. As the death toll mounts the police are more and more baffled, and the writer becomes more closely linked to the case than is comfortable.

programme.title: Have A Good Funeral, My Friend...Sartana Will Pay

programme.title: Banana Joe
programme.desc: Banana Joe lives in a tropical village in Africa which is unaffected by modern life. One day he discovers he needs a permit to operate his boat so goes off to the big city to get one. On the way he witnesses television, crooks and many delights for the first time as well as falling in love.

programme.title: Stepmom
programme.desc: Isabel, a fashion photographer, struggles to endear herself to her divorcee boyfriend's children and his ex-wife Jackie. However, a diagnosis of terminal cancer sparks a change in their relationship.

programme.title: The Starving Games
programme.desc: In a deadly game orchestrated by President Snowballs, skilled archer Kantmiss Evershot, her boyfriend Dale and tech-savvy ally Peter Malarkey must rely on their wits and skills to survive.

programme.title: Mune
programme.desc: Necross, the former guardian of the sun, turns evil and steals it. Now, Mune, Glim and Sohone, three friends, must work together to retrieve it back from him.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: The Love Laugh Live Show
programme.desc: The host invites prominent personalities and engages them in candid conversations about their personal and professional lives.

programme.title: StreetDance 2
programme.desc: After an embaressing defeat, a street dancer, Ash, assembles the best dancers from all across the world for another around against the Invincible crew.

programme.title: What's Your Number?
programme.desc: With her career crashing and her boyfriend dumping her, Ally tries to contact her former partners in the desperate hope of finding true love.

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A celebrated military contractor reconnects with a long-lost love while falling for the air-force officer assigned to him.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Eight very different couples and their love lives intertwine during a hectic month before Christmas in London.

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: Things get interesting when Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent and a disguise master, assumes the role of an elderly lady to nab an escaped convict.

programme.title: Eat Pray Love
programme.desc: Elizabeth Gilbert's perfect world comes shattering down when she gets divorced. She then embarks on a journey across the world in an attempt to rediscover her true self.

programme.title: The Intern
programme.desc: Ben Whittaker, a 70-year-old widower, realises that he is not cut out for retirement. He then applies to become a senior intern for a sceptical boss at an online fashion site.

programme.title: Carpool
programme.desc: Daniel Miller has to take care of the carpool for his sons and the neighbourhood school children when his wife falls sick. However, in the course of the day, he finds himself a victim of a robbery.

programme.title: DC League of Super-Pets
programme.desc: Superman and his super-dog Krypto share the same power and fight crime together. However, when Superman gets kidnapped, Krypto trains harder to rescue him.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Henry falls in love with Lucy, whose short-term memory loss makes her forget him every time she falls asleep. As a result, Henry decides to win her over every day after she wakes up.

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couple's life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their baby's arrival, Marley completes their family.

programme.title: Marley & Me
programme.desc: A newlywed couple's life transforms after adopting Marley, a mischievous dog whose antics bring joy. Subsequently, as they navigate parenthood with their baby's arrival, Marley completes their family.

programme.title: Safe Haven
programme.desc: A mysterious young woman arrives in Southport, North Carolina, and falls in love with a widowed store owner. However, her dark past intrudes in her new life.

programme.title: Fly Me to the Moon
programme.desc: Isabelle plans to marry a stranger to break a family curse, which leads every first marriage to end in a divorce, in order to get married to her long-time boyfriend Pierre.

programme.title: DSC
programme.desc: Talented directors provide an entertaining insight into the most intriguing stories and anecdotes concerning some of their best works.

programme.title: The Way, Way Back
programme.desc: Duncan, a shy teenager, visits a beach house owned by his mother's boyfriend. Annoyed with everyone, he wanders away to a local water park and meets Owen, who helps him open up to the world.

programme.title: What to Expect When You're Expecting
programme.desc: Five couples from Atlanta buckle up to deal with the joys and sorrows of having a baby for the first time. However, they soon realise that parenthood demands a lot more than they anticipated.

programme.title: Lay the Favorite
programme.desc: Ambitious about living the life of a cocktail waitress, a lap dancer tries her luck in Las Vegas. However, her life takes an unexpected turn after she falls in love with a sports gambler.

programme.title: To Be Announced
programme.desc: Bringing the best in television.

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
programme.desc: While playing on a cruise ship, the chipmunks and the chipettes take their pranks too far and end up stranded on a tropical island, only to discover it is not as deserted as it seems.

programme.title: Big Momma's House 2
programme.desc: Malcolm Turner, an FBI agent, reprises his disguise as a Southern grandmother and works as a nanny to unveil the culprits responsible for designing a deadly computer virus.

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: When a middle-aged advertising executive is gifted with the power to read women's minds, he uses it to outwit his new boss.

programme.title: Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: After FBI agent Malcolm Turner's stepson, Trent, witnesses a murder, the two are forced to go undercover. While Malcolm turns into Big Momma, Trent disguises himself as Charmaine.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sports agent Jerry Maguire tries to get back on his feet after being fired from his job. However, the only client he has is Rod Tidwell, a disgruntled football player who wants a better contract.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Peter Rabbit lives in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden with his three sisters. Their joyful lives are interrupted by the arrival of Thomas, Mr. McGregor's nephew, who wants to drive Peter away.

programme.title: Breaking Up
